Origin Monitoring.description: Cloudflare is unable to reach your origin

Receive an alert whenever your users load a resource from a new domain not previously seen.

Script Monitor.display_name: Page Shield New Malicious Domain Alert
Script Monitor.description: Receive an alert whenever a resource loaded by your users is hosted under a domain reported as malicious.

Script Monitor.display_name: Page Shield New Malicious Script Alert
Script Monitor.description: Receive an alert whenever a JavaScript file loaded by your users is classified as malicious.

Script Monitor.display_name: Page Shield New Malicious URL Alert
Script Monitor.description: Receive an alert whenever a resource loaded by your users is from a URL reported as malicious.

Script Monitor.display_name: Page Shield New Resource URL Exceeds Max Length Alert
Script Monitor.description: Receive an alert whenever we detect a resource with a very large URL
Receive an alert whenever your users load a new resource that has not been previously seen.
